EmailTemplate.description: Send to customer after adding to Opt Out Campaign.
EmailTemplate.name: Update - Unsubscribe Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Privacy Request - Unsubscribe Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
We have received your request to unsubscribe your email address from receiving marketing communications from DuPont.
Be advised that your email address has been unsubscribed from our database(s).
For further questions and assistance, please contact us using the details provided below.
Sincerely,
DuPont Corporate Contact 974 Centre Road Chestnut Run Plaza 735 2175-1 Wilmington, DE 19805 Toll-free: 1-855-569-0964
